categories: Category:Star Wars: Force and Destiny adventures

nodes.text: Lost Legacies is an adventure for Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Force and Destiny roleplaying game. It was available to attendees at Gen Con Game Fair in August 2014. Players assume the role of Jedi in the Galactic Civil War and must investigate a derelict Hammerhead-class starship.
This is basically a rename of the "Lessons from the Past" adventure found in the Core Rulebook.
